jobDescription: Joseph T. Ryerson&Son;, Inc., one of the largest metals distributors in the US, is currently seeking a Data Analyst to join our Analytics team in Lisle, IL. The successful candidate plays a vital role in driving financial performance by automating the collection, cleansing and enhancement of data to enable the creation of analytic tools used by the Business. The Analytics team is part of the office of the Chief Data Officer and supports key decision makers throughout all functional areas and management levels of Ryerson. Our toolset includes best in breed software such as IBM Cognos, Oracle, SAP and Salesforce.com as well as the ability to leverage in-house programming resources for custom application development. Roles and Responsibilities:Understand the content, structure and business meaning of data from various systems such as the Data Warehouse, ERP Platforms, web site and various external sources. Help enable ongoing expansion of same.Gather and document requirements for datasets and reports as well as business user training materials.Aid in the data collection, testing and validation for newly created and expansion of existing data sources.Collaborate on development of analytic tools with business experts, programmers, developers and other analysts. These tools include reports, dashboards, models and ad-hoc queries used by decision makers to gain required insight into complex business circumstances utilizing software such as Cognos, Salesforce.com, SPSS, SAP, Google Analytics or Excel.Troubleshooting the analytic database environment and reportsWork with data from a variety of business disciplines ranging from the local service center operations to corporate departments such as Sales, Supply Chain, Operations, Human Resources, Accounting, and Treasury.Provide tactical analytical support to meet business demands as required.
